TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ResourceProviderFactory extends System.Object

summary.span: 用作创建资源提供程序的类的基类。

span.span: Serves as the base class for classes that create resource providers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一个可作为返回全局和本地资源提供程序的对象的基类的抽象类。 is an abstract class that serves as the base class for objects that return global and local resource providers. 类必须派生自实现其功能。Classes must derive from to implement its functionality. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示一个自定义的资源提供程序工厂，它检索缓存的值。The following code example shows a customized resource provider factory that retrieves cached values. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Compilation.ResourceProviderFactory#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Compilation.ResourceProviderFactory/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Compilation.ResourceProviderFactory#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Compilation.ResourceProviderFactory/VB/source.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 在派生类中实现时，初始化派生类的新实例。

span.span: When implemented in a derived class, initializes a new instance of the derived class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 无法创建抽象类的实例。An instance of an abstract class cannot be created. 派生自的类可以实现一个构造函数来设置所有默认值。Classes that derive from can implement a constructor to set any default values.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Web.Compilation.IResourceProvider CreateGlobalResourceProvider(string classKey) cil managed
Public MustOverride Function CreateGlobalResourceProvider (classKey As String) As IResourceProvider

span.span: The name of the resource class.

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，创建一个全局资源提供程序。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, creates a global resource provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当在派生类中重写此方法会返回对象给定`classKey`参数。When overridden in a derived class, this method returns an object for the given `classKey` parameter. 此方法无法实现以便`classKey`是 App_GlobalResources 文件夹中的.resx 文件的名称。The method could be implemented such that `classKey` is the name of a .resx file in the App_GlobalResources folder. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示实现一个自定义的资源提供程序工厂方法和检索缓存值。The following code example shows a customized resource provider factory that implements the method and retrieves cached values. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Compilation.ResourceProviderFactory#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Compilation.ResourceProviderFactory/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Compilation.ResourceProviderFactory#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Compilation.ResourceProviderFactory/VB/source.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Web.Compilation.IResourceProvider CreateLocalResourceProvider(string virtualPath) cil managed
Public MustOverride Function CreateLocalResourceProvider (virtualPath As String) As IResourceProvider

span.span: The path to a resource file.

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，创建一个本地资源提供程序。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, creates a local resource provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当在派生类中重写此方法会返回对象给定`virtualPath`参数。When overridden in a derived class, this method returns an object for the given `virtualPath` parameter. 此方法无法实现以便`virtualPath`映射到的资源文件。The method could be implemented such that `virtualPath` maps to a resource file. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示实现一个自定义的资源提供程序工厂方法和检索缓存值。The following code example shows a customized resource provider factory that implements the method and retrieves cached values. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Compilation.ResourceProviderFactory#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Compilation.ResourceProviderFactory/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Compilation.ResourceProviderFactory#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Compilation.ResourceProviderFactory/VB/source.vb#2)]
